will be able to see if the rash

If it doesn’t change colour, 
contact your GP, phone 
999 or take your baby to 
the emergency department 
immediately.
Group B streptococcal 
infection
Group B streptococcal 
infection is a life-threatening 
infection in babies. Most 
babies who are infected show 
symptoms within 12 hours of 
birth, but there are some who 
get it later. The symptoms 
include:
• being	flopp
